item.title: WHOIAM
item.description: I am working for Master degree of Distributed Systems in KTH Royal Institute of Technology. I am a believer of Arch Linux, I dare not presume to say I am well-known Linux, I had used Arch Linux as the only systemd for 3 years, then I switch back to the Microsoft camp after Microsoft began to do right things. Now I work on Arch Linux as WSL and a plan b system.
